function.arguments:
{"path":"Munkres_exercise_13_4a1.lean","content":"import Mathlib
open Set Filter Topology

/-- If $\mathcal{T}_\alpha$ is a family of topologies on $X$, show that $\bigcap \mathcal{T}_\alpha$ is a topology on $X$. -/

import Mathlib
open Set Filter Topology

/-- If $\mathcal{T}_\alpha$ is a family of topologies on $X$, show that $\bigcap \mathcal{T}_\alpha$ is a topology on $X$. -/
theorem isTopologicalSpace_sInf {X : Type*} (ùíØ : Set (TopologicalSpace X)) :
  IsTopologicalSpace (sInf ùíØ) := by
  -- sInf ùíØ is already the infimum (intersection) of topologies, which is a topology
  apply TopologicalSpace.isTopologicalSpace_sInf
